amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Organic Transitions Program from $1.855 million to $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding (by offset) for the organic transition program by $3,145,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Holt.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
